TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MessageBox extends System.Object

summary.span: 顯示訊息方塊。

span.span: Displays a message box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息方塊是預先製作好強制回應對話方塊，顯示一則簡訊給使用者。A message box is a prefabricated modal dialog box that displays a text message to a user. 您藉由呼叫靜態顯示訊息方塊方法類別。You show a message box by calling the static method of the class. 顯示的文字訊息為字串引數傳遞給。The text message that is displayed is the string argument that you pass to . 數個多載的方法也可讓您提供標題列標題。Several overloads of the method also enables you to provide a title bar caption. 若要讓使用者關閉訊息方塊中，顯示訊息方塊具有**確定**按鈕和**關閉**標題列中的按鈕。To enable a user to close a message box, displays a message box that has an **OK** button and a **Close** button in the title bar. 您也可以使用訊息方塊詢問問題的使用者。You can also use a message box to ask a user a question. 按一下其中一個您指定要使用顯示的數個按鈕的使用者答案列舉型別。The user answers by clicking one of several buttons that you specify to display by using the enumeration. 您可以將這個列舉型別傳遞至數個多載的方法。You can pass this enumeration to several overloads of the method. 預設值列舉型別是。The default value of the enumeration is . 您可以判斷哪一個按鈕，使用者按一下藉由檢查值，傳回。You can determine which button a user clicks by examining the value that returns. 傳回值是值為列舉，其中每個值等於其中一個按鈕可以顯示訊息方塊。The return value is a value of the enumeration, where each value equates to one of the buttons that a message box can display. 訊息方塊的預設值是因為**確定**是預設的訊息方塊按鈕。The default value for message box is because **OK** is the default message box button. 不過，有些多載的方法可讓您提供其他預設值。However, some overloads of the method enable you to provide a different default value. 訊息方塊可以進行通訊的資訊，而且可以要求具有不同程度的重要性的問題。Message boxes can communicate information and can ask questions that have varying degrees of importance. 訊息方塊會使用圖示來表示重要性。Message boxes use icons to indicate importance. 比方說，圖示可以表示訊息是告知性、 是一個警告，或很重要。For example, icons can indicate whether the message is informational, is a warning, or is important. 列舉封裝可能的訊息方塊圖示的設定。The enumeration encapsulates the set of possible message box icons. 根據預設，訊息方塊不會顯示圖示。By default, a message box does not display an icon. 不過，您可以傳遞值設為其中數個方法多載，以指定訊息方塊包含圖示。However, you can pass a value to one of several method overloads in order to specify that the message box includes an icon. 訊息方塊有時會提供特殊功能，例如由右至左讀取。Message boxes sometimes provide special functionality, such as right-to-left reading. 您可以使用下列其中一個或多個自訂訊息方塊的行為列舉值，一些多載會接受方法。You can customize the behavior of a message box by using one or more enumeration values that are accepted by some overloads of the method. 訊息方塊一律會有主控視窗。Message boxes always have an owner window. 根據預設，訊息方塊的擁有者是目前作用中時，會開啟訊息方塊應用程式中的視窗。By default, the owner of a message box is the window that is currently active in an application at the time that a message box is opened. 不過，您可以指定另一個擁有者使用一種多載。However, you can specify another owner for the by using one of several overloads. 如需擁有者的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about owner windows, see . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[MessageBox 範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160023)。For more information, see [MessageBox Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160023).

summary.span: 顯示訊息方塊。

span.span: Displays a message box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的多載方法，可讓您指定主控視窗。Use an overload of the method, which enables you to specify an owner window. 否則，訊息方塊的擁有者是目前作用中視窗。Otherwise, the message box is owned by the window that is currently active.

summary.span: 顯示訊息方塊，該訊息方塊含有訊息並傳回結果。

span.span: Displays a message box that has a message and that returns a result.

returns.span: 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

span.span: A value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

param.span: 值，指定要顯示的一個或多個按鈕。

span.span: A value that specifies which button or buttons to display.
A value that specifies the icon to display.

param.name: defaultResult
param.span: 值，指定訊息方塊的預設結果。

span.span: A value that specifies the default result of the message box.
A value object that specifies the options.

summary.span: 在指定的視窗前顯示訊息方塊。

span.span: Displays a message box in front of the specified window.

summary.span: 訊息方塊會顯示訊息、標題列標題、按鈕和圖示、且接受預設訊息方塊結果、遵循指定之選項並傳回結果。

span.span: The message box displays a message, title bar caption, button, and icon; and accepts a default message box result, complies with the specified options, and returns a result.

returns.span: 值，指定使用者所按的訊息方塊按鈕。

span.span: A value that specifies which message box button is clicked by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，目前為作用中視窗的前面出現訊息方塊。By default, the message box appears in front of the window that is currently active.
